trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The aspiring songstress wishes to practice her singing without interruption.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the aspiring songstress.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_TODO_01<tab>Stand watch near the Clave, and defeat any threats that appear.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the aspiring songstress.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the aspiring songstress.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_000<tab>What have we here? An admirer, come to exult in the purity of my vocal splendor?
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_001<tab>No...? I...well...<sigh>
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_002<tab>Grrr! You would feel <var 1A 02 /var>honored<var 1A 01 /var> to meet me if I was ever allowed to test the limits of my instrument!
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_003<tab>One day I shall be the talk of Eulmore─nay, of all Norvrandt─but first I must secure a venue in which to practice.

TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_004<tab>If I sing at but a fraction of my full volume, the cretins around here become so unreasonably angry! Insulting, even! Thus I have taken to finding a quiet spot near the coast.

TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_005<tab>Yet even there, my scales and trills seem to drive the wildlife into a frenzy. I can scarce begin my practice before I'm forced to flee from some enraged beast!

TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_006<tab>Hmmm, you look to have seen your fair share of fighting. What say you to standing guard and allowing <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> my fair share of singing?
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_007<tab>Pretty, pretty please...?
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_011<tab>Ah, 'tis so invigorating to sing here─I feel as if my voice rings clear across the sea.
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_012<tab>Now, if you would be so kind as to intercept any nuisances before they ruin my practice, I should be most appreciative!
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>The sound of singing is almost entirely drowned out by the waves crashing down below...
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_020<tab>Ah, that was simply wonderful! You don't know how long it's been since I was last able to sing to my heart's content!
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_021<tab>And it's all thanks to you!♪ Let us return to town so I might show you the proper gratitude!
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_030<tab>Thank you ever so much for your help! I almost wish I could keep you on as an assistant...

TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_031<tab>I know I seem to be struggling through a rough patch at the moment, but once I make a name for myself in Eulmore's cabaret show, the privileged will be climbing over each other to offer me patronage!
TEXT_LUCKZA013_03355_DIVA03355_000_032<tab>And then, when I'm wealthy and famous, you shall have the reward you deserve. For now, however, this is all I can afford... Consider it an advance payment!
